steps.title: Slice the cucumbers as you usually do.
steps.content: Slice the cucumbers as you usually do. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You'll probably need to layer them—that's fine.
steps.content: You'll probably need to layer them—that's fine.

steps.title: Keep the cucumbers in the colander.
steps.content: Keep the cucumbers in the colander.

steps.title: Sprinkle the cucumbers with salt and cover the slices with ice cubes.
steps.content: Sprinkle the cucumbers with salt and cover the slices with ice cubes.

steps.title: Leave them in the refrigerator one hour.
steps.content: Leave them in the refrigerator one hour. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The cucumber is now ready to serve.
steps.content: The cucumber is now ready to serve. If you're not quite ready to serve, simply pop the slices back into the fridge; they'll stay crisp. [3] X Research source
